title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1927.4 - Approved residence
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1927.4 - Approved residence

State Regulations

The approved residence at which an inmate participating in
a day reporting program is permitted to reside shall be the same residence such
inmate was previously furloughed to pursuant to Part 1903 of this Title, unless
a different residence is approved by the director of TRP or his
designee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
1927.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
